extendedInfo.description: Battery-friendly background service that will automatically mute the media volume on your phone when you change the ringer to silent.Features:- Ability to mute on silent mode, as well as vibrate.- Ability to restore media volume to what it was before going to silent/vibrate.This app will NOT change the alarm volume. It only makes sense, and if you want the alarm volume to be silent when the phone is silent, please do so on your preferred alarm application, most let you change this setting.

reviews.title: Thx
reviews.comment: Thx for this i always forget to mute media and games start making noise unwanted. This will help me a lot.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Fully mutes ALL sounds, including camera shutter sound (at least on my Galaxy S2)! Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app.
reviews.comment: Does as advertised! And it\'s free! Now I can fully mute my phone as long as silent mode is on it will override other sound settings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank you!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been looking for something like this for ages and every time I would ask in a forum if something like this existed I\'d just get a bunch of useless posts asking why I would want that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best got better
reviews.comment: Always a must have app...and now the developer removes all unnecessary permissions.  Superb.  Take my money.
reviews.author: Paige Miller

reviews.title: Perfect and essential
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it says and nothing more, nothing less.  Finally, silent means silent.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why isn\'t this native?
reviews.comment: I\'ve run into a number of embarrassing situations in meetings where my music started playing because I hit the wrong widget. This completely eliminates that problem, which should never have existed in the first place. Who puts their phone on vibrate and still wants music to blare out of it?  I use this with SilentTime for perfect peace of mind in the office.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: works as described
reviews.comment: This app makes up for missing/broken functionality/preferences in stock android. Obviously if I silence the phone I don\'t want it to make noise. No special permissions required to run is a nice bonus.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what it says it does!
reviews.comment: CM10.1 for i777 (the latest nightlies) has been driving me crazy since media sounds continue to play through the speakers despite having the phone set to silent or vibrate.  Notifications and phone calls responded appropriately but only games, videos, etc. would continue to play through the speakers.    I\'m assuming it\'s currently a bug.    However, this has been exactly what I\'ve been searching for as a stopgap until the bug in CM10.1 is fixed.    This works perfectly and kills ALL volume for Media, Notification, Ringtones (IDK about alarms since I don\'t use my phone as an alarm clock).    Thank you!
reviews.author: Tony Chun

reviews.title: Really full silent!
reviews.comment: This app is a very good app, works very greatttt!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank you.
reviews.comment: Makes my life so much easier.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Broken
reviews.comment: Stopped working with 4.1 OS update.  Tried uninstall and reinstall but still broken
reviews.author: Baz O

reviews.comment: Great app. Does what it says.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A hit and a miss
reviews.comment: I installed it on my LTE Galaxy Nexus and my Nexus 7.  Both have AudioGuru installed on them. On the Galaxy running ICS 4.0.4, it works fine but on the Nexus 7 running JB 4.1.1, it keeps the AudioGuru Mode widget from functioning correctly.  If I disable RealSilent, then the AudioGuru Mode widget works fine.
reviews.author: A Google User
